name: Rock, Paper, Scissors Extreme!
description:
The exact same rules as a game of Rock/Paper/Scissors except extreme platformer edition! The only difference you are vulnerable in your neutral state.

Player 1
-----
Left/Right: A/D
Rock/Paper/Scissors: G/H/J
Jump: W

Player 2
-----
Left/Right: Arrow Keys
Rock/Paper/Scissors: 1/2/3(Numpad)
Jump: Enter (Numpad)

Controller (Player 1/2)
----
Left/Right: Left Joystick
Rock/Paper/Scissors: X/Y/B
Jump: A
